trans-unit.source: Update manifest file to enable notifications
trans-unit.target: Update manifest file to enable notifications

trans-unit.source: Copy the in-app messaging resources below into your Manifest.xml between the `<application>` and `</application>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Copy the in-app messaging resources below into your Manifest.xml between the `<application>` and `</application>` tags.

trans-unit.source: Specify an icon for notifications
trans-unit.target: Specify an icon for notifications

trans-unit.source: Paste the following XML snippet in your Manifest.xml between the `<application>` and `</application>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Paste the following XML snippet in your Manifest.xml between the `<application>` and `</application>` tags.

trans-unit.source: This defines the icon that is displayed both in system and in-app notifications.
trans-unit.target: This defines the icon that is displayed both in system and in-app notifications.

trans-unit.source: It is optional for in-app notifications however mandatory for system notifications.
trans-unit.target: It is optional for in-app notifications however mandatory for system notifications.

trans-unit.source: Android will rejects system notifications with invalid icons.
trans-unit.target: Android will rejects system notifications with invalid icons.

trans-unit.source: Make sure you are using an icon that exists in one of the **drawable** folders (like ``engagement_close.png``).
trans-unit.target: Make sure you are using an icon that exists in one of the **drawable** folders (like ``engagement_close.png``).

trans-unit.source: **mipmap** folder isn't supported.
trans-unit.target: **mipmap** folder isn't supported.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] You should not use the **launcher** icon.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] You should not use the **launcher** icon.

trans-unit.source: It has a different resolution and is usually in the mipmap folders, which we don't support.
trans-unit.target: It has a different resolution and is usually in the mipmap folders, which we don't support.

trans-unit.source: For real apps, you can use an icon that is suitable for notifications per [Android design guidelines](http://developer.android.com/design/patterns/notifications.html).
trans-unit.target: For real apps, you can use an icon that is suitable for notifications per [Android design guidelines](http://developer.android.com/design/patterns/notifications.html).

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP] To be sure to use correct icon resolutions, you can look at [these examples](https://www.google.com/design/icons).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP] To be sure to use correct icon resolutions, you can look at [these examples](https://www.google.com/design/icons).

trans-unit.source: Scroll down to the **Notification** section, click an icon, and then click `PNGS` to download the icon drawable set.
trans-unit.target: Scroll down to the **Notification** section, click an icon, and then click `PNGS` to download the icon drawable set.

trans-unit.source: You can see what drawable folders with which resolution to use for each version of the icon.
trans-unit.target: You can see what drawable folders with which resolution to use for each version of the icon.

trans-unit.source: Enable your app to receive GCM push notifications
trans-unit.target: Enable your app to receive GCM push notifications

trans-unit.source: Paste the following into your Manifest.xml between the `<application>` and `</application>` tags after replacing the `project number` obtained from your Google Play console.
trans-unit.target: Paste the following into your Manifest.xml between the `<application>` and `</application>` tags after replacing the `project number` obtained from your Google Play console.

trans-unit.source: The \n is intentional so make sure that you end the project number with it.
trans-unit.target: The \n is intentional so make sure that you end the project number with it.

trans-unit.source: Paste the code below into your Manifest.xml between the `<application>` and `</application>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Paste the code below into your Manifest.xml between the `<application>` and `</application>` tags.

trans-unit.source: Replace the package name
trans-unit.target: Replace the package name

trans-unit.source: Add the last set of permissions that are highlighted before the `<application>` tag.
trans-unit.target: Add the last set of permissions that are highlighted before the `<application>` tag.

trans-unit.source: Replace `<Your package name>` by the actual package name of your application.
trans-unit.target: Replace `<Your package name>` by the actual package name of your application.
